PackedSection Class Reference

This class is used to represent a packed, binary section that has children. More...

class  ChildRecord

Detailed Description

This class is used to represent a packed, binary section that has children.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const char *  pData,
int  dataLen,
SectionType  type,
PackedSectionFilePtr  pFile 
)

Constructor for PackedSection.

Parameters:
name The tag name of this section
pData The data associated with the PackedSection.
dataLen The length of the data.
type Indicates the type of packed section.
pFile A smart pointer to the parent file.

DataSectionCreator *  creator 
) [virtual]

Find the child with the given tag name.

Parameters:
tag Name of child to find
creator This parameter is ignored for PackedSections.
Returns:
A PackedSection matching tag on success, NULL on error.

DataSectionPtr PackedSection::newSection ( const std::string &  tag,
DataSectionCreator *  creator = NULL 
) [virtual]

This method creates a new section directly under the current section.

It should be the same type as the parent section, or NULL if not appropriate.

Implements DataSection.
